metadata.description: The friendly name for the workbook that is used in the Gallery or Saved List.  This name must be unique within a resource group.
The gallery that the workbook will been shown under. Supported values include workbook, tsg, etc. Usually, this is 'workbook'
The id of resource instance to which the workbook will be associated
The unique guid for this workbook instance

](https://github.com/dolevshor/Azure-VirtualMachines-Insights/issues) with the workbook template to GitHub.","style":"upsell"},"name":"text - Main Title"},{"type":3,"content":{"version":"KqlItem/1.0","query":"resources | where type == "microsoft.compute/virtualmachines" | where resourceGroup in~ (split("{ResourceGroup:label}", ", ")) | where name in~ (split("{VMs:label}", ", ")) | extend Details = pack_all() | extend vmSize = properties.hardwareProfile.vmSize, timeCreated = properties.timeCreated, osDisk = properties.storageProfile.osDisk.managedDisk.id, osType = properties.storageProfile.osDisk.osType, powerState = properties.extended.instanceView.powerState | project id, resourceGroup, location, vmSize, osType, powerState = powerState.displayStatus, timeCreated, osDisk, subscriptionId, tags, Details","size":3,"showExportToExcel":true,"queryType":1,"resourceType":"microsoft.resourcegraph/resources","crossComponentResources":["{Subscription}"],"visualization":"table","gridSettings":{"formatters":[{"columnMatch":"$gen_group","formatter":13,"formatOptions":{"linkTarget":"Resource","linkIsContextBlade":false,"showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"id","formatter":5},{"columnMatch":"location","formatter":17},{"columnMatch":"vmSize","formatter":1},{"columnMatch":"osType","formatter":1},{"columnMatch":"powerState","formatter":1},{"columnMatch":"timeCreated","formatter":6},{"columnMatch":"osDisk","formatter":13,"formatOptions":{"linkTarget":"Resource","linkIsContextBlade":false,"showIcon":true}},{"columnMatch":"subscriptionId","formatter":5},{"columnMatch":"Details","formatter":7,"formatOptions":{"linkTarget":"CellDetails","linkLabel":"üîç
